attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what all the fuss was about and little did i know what was in store for me. upon opening the app i was greeted with a quite frankly disturbing photo. it was an old man, and iâ€™m not sure what is wrong with him, but he looked like a deflated basketball or a rotting peach! i have no clue why he looks like that but i donâ€™t think that is what people should see when first opening the app. also, this man was standing in front of the american flag holding up a fist. you might think there is nothing wrong with that but the look on his face was very sad. i think this must have been because there was something reflective behind the camera and he saw himself. in this photo his expression should be happy and proud but it was the exact opposite.
